entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 3:57 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.7°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then a few flurries. Blowing snow. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
